title: LOSS FORGIVEN NOW PLEASE
body:
I was 3 lvls up top and 2 kills then I dc, I wouldve won that game so hard but it dced im so mad right now, ruins my riven kda and win rate if this counted I will be so kfn jqndwm,./\

IM ON THE ACOUNT CALLED "Skillzord" I am fully dced atm and everyone in the game has been dcing for teh last 30minutes

replies.body: Loss Forgiven is only enabled when there is an issue affecting the majority of people; you can't get it individually.

cant do anthigfbqnwdf.;e';fqm this is so %%%%ed , please riot at least say why. IM SO %%%%ING MAD CAUSE I REMEMVBER ALL TEH %%%%ING TIMES THIS HAPPENED AN NO LOSS FORGIVE THIS BEST NOT BE ONE OF THOSE FUKCINGT TIMES!
